noPlayers.addPlayer: You can add the first player to the game.
noPlayers.headline: This is your administration panel for your game.

GameDashboardInvite.modalTitle: Add a new player to the game
GameDashboardInvite.addPlayerDescription: You can add players yourself and share his dashboard link later.
GameDashboardInvite.gameStarted: The game started, you cannot invite new persons in the game.
GameDashboardInvite.linkDescription: You can share the URL bellow and let user register to this game.
GameDashboardInvite.title: Invite more players

GameJoin.description1: Just fill the form and you are good to go!
GameJoin.gameAlreadyStartedWaring: The game already started, you cannot register.
GameJoin.title: You have been invited to join a party!

GameJoinLink.gameStartedWarning: The game started, you cannot invite new persons in the game.

GameStartButton.areYouSure: In order to start the game, each player need to be aware of their corresponding dashboard link. In case you added them yourself to the game, you need to send them the link.
GameStartButton.confirm: Yes, I want to start the game
